titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the nomination of individuals for election to the offices of the President and Vice President of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the direct election of the President and Vice President. Sets forth procedures relating to the nomination of presidential and vice presidential candidates.
